org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.tools.offlineEditsViewer

Class OfflineEditsXmlLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.tools.offlineEditsViewer.OfflineEditsXmlLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OfflineEditsLoader, ContentHandler, DTDHandler, EntityResolver, ErrorHandler

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
@InterfaceStability.Unstable
 class OfflineEditsXmlLoader
extends DefaultHandler
implements OfflineEditsLoader
    OfflineEditsXmlLoader walks an EditsVisitor over an OEV XML file
